name: The Devil's Game -Demo
description:
The Devil's Game: An Interactive Story

Frank and Rick are detectives working for the Los Angeles Police Department. A war has been brewing between the gangs H.H.H, The Russians and The Bulls.

On one night, gang members are savagely murdered but the culprits fail to come forward raising tensions higher than they have ever been before.

It is up to Frank and Rick to discover the truth behind the increasingly horrifying murders before the city is burnt to ashes in an all out gang war.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Demo version includes: Prologue and Chapter 1.

(Leave me a comment if you would like to see more. Donations are welcome. Please enjoy the game.)
